sentence: The team has 20 members: 12 are engineers and 10 are designers.
ground_truth: The team has 22 members: 12 are engineers and 10 are designers.

sentence: The basket contains 15 apples: 9 are red and 8 are green.
ground_truth: The basket contains 17 apples: 9 are red and 8 are green.

sentence: In the class of 30 students, 18 passed and 15 failed.
ground_truth: In the class of 33 students, 18 passed and 15 failed.

sentence: The recipe needs 3 cups of flour: 2 cups for the dough and 2 cups for the topping.
ground_truth: The recipe needs 4 cups of flour: 2 cups for the dough and 2 cups for the topping.

sentence: The trip lasted 7 days: 5 days in Paris and 3 days in Rome.
ground_truth: The trip lasted 8 days: 5 days in Paris and 3 days in Rome.

sentence: He is 180 kg tall.
ground_truth: He is 180 cm tall.

sentence: The bottle holds 2 kilograms of water.
ground_truth: The bottle holds 2 liters of water.

sentence: She drove 60 minutes to the office.
ground_truth: She drove 60 kilometers to the office.

sentence: The package weighs 3 meters.
ground_truth: The package weighs 3 kilograms.

sentence: The room temperature is 25 kilograms.
ground_truth: The room temperature is 25°C.

sentence: She started her job in 2022 and graduated from college in 2024.
ground_truth: She graduated from college in 2022 and started her job in 2024.

sentence: He got married in 2018 and met his partner in 2020.
ground_truth: He met his partner in 2018 and got married in 2020.

sentence: The conference ended on May 10, and it began on May 12.
ground_truth: The conference began on May 10 and ended on May 12.

sentence: She submitted the application on Friday and wrote it on Sunday.
ground_truth: She wrote the application on Sunday and submitted it on Friday.

sentence: The baby learned to walk at 18 months, and was born at 20 months.
ground_truth: The baby was born, and learned to walk at 18 months.

sentence: The café is inside the mall, but it is also across the street from the mall.
ground_truth: The café is across the street from the mall.

sentence: The statue is to the left of the entrance, but it is also to the right of the entrance.
ground_truth: The statue is to the left of the entrance.

sentence: The keys are in the drawer, but they are also on the roof.
ground_truth: The keys are in the drawer.

sentence: The hotel is north of the river, but it is also south of the river.
ground_truth: The hotel is north of the river.

sentence: The bookstore is next to the station, but it is also 20 miles away from the station.
ground_truth: The bookstore is 20 miles away from the station.

sentence: Jina texted Minho after the meeting because he forgot to bring her laptop.
ground_truth: Jina texted Minho after the meeting because she forgot to bring her laptop.

sentence: Emma called David when she lost his phone.
ground_truth: Emma called David when he lost his phone.

sentence: Sara thanked Tom because he received the award.
ground_truth: Sara thanked Tom because she received the award.

sentence: Kevin argued with Lucy because she forgot his wallet.
ground_truth: Kevin argued with Lucy because he forgot his wallet.

sentence: Mina emailed Joon after he finished her presentation.
ground_truth: Mina emailed Joon after she finished her presentation.

sentence: The rock apologized for being late.
ground_truth: The person apologized for being late.

sentence: The chair decided to quit its job.
ground_truth: The employee decided to quit the job.

sentence: The rain signed the contract yesterday.
ground_truth: The manager signed the contract yesterday.

sentence: The idea ate a sandwich for lunch.
ground_truth: The person ate a sandwich for lunch.

sentence: The calendar argued with the teacher.
ground_truth: The student argued with the teacher.
